name: Blue Solar: Chaos War
description: Introducing Blue Solar: Chaos War, a roguelike sci-fi space adventure. Become a trader, pirate, adventurer and more. Shape a randomly generated universe. Invest in economies, engage in war, and compete for planets for your chosen government. Unite the universe, or lay waste to it all.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: As a senior player with more than and 500 games. I can only say. Pixel style universe war game. This is rare. Content is also relatively rich.Kingsoft is a china big game company.He give up the high salary to do his own game. This is a dream, a kind of inspiration. Maybe one day, I will throw away my company... Design my own game,we need more and more these people! have draem!
